import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; export const Popup = ({ ConfirmAddUser }) => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({name: '', email: '', password: '', admin:'No'}); const submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); ConfirmAddUser(newUser); } const cancelHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); } return (

New User

setNewUser({...newUser, name: event.target.value})} value={newUser.name} />
setNewUser({...newUser, email: event.target.value})} value={newUser.email} />
setNewUser({...newUser, password: event.target.value})} value={newUser.password} />
) }
